name: ThinkPad X1 Carbon Gen 12 Core Ultra
description: A sleek and lightweight ultrabook powered by the latest Intel i7 processor with 16GB RAM and 512GB SSD.

name: Mechanical Gaming Keyboard RGB
description: Tactile mechanical keyboard with customizable RGB lighting and anti-ghosting keys.

name: 4K Curved Gaming Monitor
description: 32-inch curved 4K UHD display with 144Hz refresh rate and HDR support for an immersive gaming experience.

name: Wireless Noise Cancelling Headphones
description: Over-ear Bluetooth headphones with active noise cancellation and 30-hour battery life.

name: Smartwatch GT 3
description: Advanced smartwatch with health tracking, GPS, and water resistance up to 50 meters.

name: Portable Bluetooth Speaker
description: Compact waterproof speaker with deep bass and 12-hour playtime, ideal for outdoor use.

name: Wireless Ergonomic Mouse
description: Ergonomic mouse with silent clicks, adjustable DPI, and rechargeable battery.

name: Smart Home Security Camera
description: 1080p Wi-Fi camera with motion detection, night vision, and cloud storage support.

name: Mechanical Gaming Mouse Pad
description: RGB-illuminated extended mouse pad with anti-slip rubber base and micro-textured surface.

name: Smart LED Desk Lamp
description: Adjustable desk lamp with touch control, brightness settings, and USB charging port.

name: Wireless Charging Pad Pro
description: Fast wireless charging pad compatible with all Qi-enabled devices.

name: Mini Drone 4K Camera
description: Compact drone with 4K camera, GPS stabilization, and 25-minute flight time.

name: VR Headset Explorer
description: Immersive VR headset with motion tracking and high-resolution display.

name: Smart Plug Wi-Fi Outlet
description: Voice-controlled Wi-Fi plug that works with Alexa and Google Assistant.

name: Mechanical SSD 1TB NVMe
description: Ultra-fast 1TB NVMe SSD with read speeds up to 3500MB/s for gaming and productivity.

name: 1080p USB Webcam
description: Full HD webcam with built-in microphone and adjustable clip for monitors and laptops.

name: Smart Thermostat 2.0
description: Wi-Fi thermostat that learns your schedule and adjusts temperature automatically.

name: Gaming Graphics Card RTX 4080
description: Next-gen NVIDIA graphics card with ray tracing and 16GB GDDR6X memory.

name: Wireless Earbuds AirPod Max Mini
description: Compact wireless earbuds with active noise cancellation and long-lasting battery.

name: Smartwatch Charging Dock
description: Magnetic charging dock compatible with all major smartwatch brands.
